taskFormat.title: Concise title
taskFormat.files: List of file paths to modify
taskFormat.deliverable: Git patch (unified diff) + test steps + risk statement
constraints: Keep changes small and reversible (git apply/patch)
Run npm test and npx tsc --noEmit before finalizing
No secret or key creation in code

patchAcceptance: 5. If tests fail: request AI to fix (new small task)
creditConservation: Batch multiple small edits into one prompt if logically linked
Use local model (Ollama) for frequent edits
Reserve Cursor credits for final review & creative tasks
Keep temperatures low, ask for structured output (diffs, not prose)
